Lesson 6

Objective

This program will make the Linkbot turn about a quarter circle on a 6 inch radius. The ultimate goal will be to make the Linkbot complete a circle. Run the program four time and see how the program works. The ratio of the inside wheel to the outside wheel is dependant on the radius of the circle. For a 6 inch The ratio is about 1.89. 

#!/usr/bin/env python
# File: ch3lesson6.py

import linkbot

# Change the robot ID shown below to the ID of your Linkbot.
robot = linkbot.Linkbot('')

robot.setJointSpeeds(90, 0, 1.89*90)
robot.move(240, 0, -1.89*240)

Explore

Investigate the inside and outside circumference of the circle and the circumference of the wheel on your Linkbot to adjust this program to make it work better.
